title: Snow Blankets The South
teaser: The southern half of the United States has been slammed with another snow storm. We check in with the mayor of Raleigh, N.C.
contentencoded:
The southern half of the United States has been slammed with another snow storm, leaving thousands without power across the Carolinas. Here & Now’s Meghna Chakrabarti checks in with Raleigh, North Carolina, Mayor Nancy McFarlane.

Guest

  • Nancy McFarlane, mayor of Raleigh, North Carolina. She tweets @NancyMcFarlane.
Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
